item.title: Stellar Blade for PC launches June 11 alongside Complete Edition
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/05/stellar-blade-for-pc-launches-june-11-alongside-complete-edition

  • PC
  • PS5

Complete Edition includes NieR: Automata and Goddess of Victory: Nikke add-ons.

The PC version of Stellar Blade will launch on June 11, publisher Sony Interactive Entertainment and developer SHIFT UP announced in a trailer posted, then removed, on the PlayStation YouTube channel (thanks, r/StellarBlade). A “Complete Edition” featuring the base game and downloadable content will be available for both PlayStation 5 and PC on the same date.

Stellar Blade first launched for PlayStation 5 on April 26, 2024.

The PC version will feature AI upscaling and frame generation via NVIDIA DLSS 4 and AMD FSR 3, an unlocked frame rate, both Japanese and Chinese voice-overs, ultrawide display support, DualSense controller support for haptic feedback and trigger effects, a new boss battle, 25 new costumes, and higher resolution environment textures. Though not yet confirmed due to the leaked nature of today’s news, the new boss battle and costumes will presumably be patched into the PlayStation 5 version.

The Complete Edition includes the following content:

  • Stellar Blade base game
  • Pre-order bonuses
    • Classic Round Glasses for Eve
    • Ear Armor Earrings for Eve
    • Planet Diving Suit (White Edition) for Eve
  • Complete Edition bonuses
    • Fluffy Bear Pack drone cosmetics
    • Planet Diving Suit (Captain) for Eve
  • Downloadable Content
    • Twin Expansion Pack
      • NieR: Automata DLC
      • Goddess of Victory: Nikke DLC
  • Goddess of Victory: Nikke CD-Key
    • Outfit CD-key to redeem same limited Stellar Blade costume in Goddess of Victory: Nikke free-to-play mobile game from SHIFT UP

Watch the new trailer below.

Release Date Trailer
